Text:
You are a legend for this Cosmo333!

I literally couldnt wait to buy it (which i will-the next time they play Scotland!!!), so kudos for acting on Gingers request to share it!!!

WiLDHEARTS since 93' Whoop Whoop

Was lucky to see the mighty Wildhearts in Stockholm earlier this month.
Felt that this album is worth charing like this (especially after Gingers request to do so).
And thanks for your kind words mitchattitude.
